item.title: New runtimes: Linux, Static and V
item.description:
You can now deploy your applications using the new linux, static and v runtimes on Clever Cloud:

  • linux is a general purpose runtime that supports any language, and fully takes advantage of the Mise package manager
  • static is a lightweight runtime for static sites, with auto-build for many static site generators (SSG)
  • v is a runtime for applications written in the V programming language

As they are new runtimes, help us improve it by reporting any issue or suggestion on the Clever Cloud Community.

  • Learn more about the Linux runtime
  • Learn more about the Static runtime
  • Learn more about the V runtime
